      • zeroPad

        public static java.lang.String zeroPad(int digitExpected,
                                       java.lang.String numToPad)
        Pads a number with 0 until it has the expected amount of digits. If the numToPad has more than the amount of digit expected, no change will be made to the String.
        Parameters:
        digitExpected - Number of digits expected
        numToPad - Number to pad with 0s
        Returns:
        Padded number

        num - Number to test decimal
        Returns:
